review_data.title: Very good location and service

review_data.title: Mrs
review_data.content: Very bad experience you can not to keep the windows open due to noise coming out from local music and cigarette smoke. The room is so small and no aircon. Breakfast was good, staff is friendly, room service was good

review_data.title: Great location!

The service, rooms and breakfast is great. The room is small but comfortable, and prices are high, but it's just...More

review_data.title: Gut für Besucher ohne Auto, wenig Gepäck und die Altstadt lieben.

review_data.title: Check out the wine cave!

review_data.title: Definitely the best Tatar!

review_data.title: The Best Beef Tatar!!!
review_data.content: The Weinschenke is an old wine cellar turned into a cozy little restaurant and wine bar. We had the best Beef Tatar ever! The staff are amazing and helpful. If you're ever in Zurich, you really should drop by here!

review_data.title: Historic wine cellar
